about_the_game:
Are you determined to show your mastery in the World Cats Cup? Then you’ll need to fully commit to the process, and the World Cats Cup Pack will be your reliable support in achieving this goal! This bundle contains everything you need for a bottom fishing tournament: heavy-duty fishing rods with matching powerful reels and a set of necessary tackles and suitable baits. The victory is almost yours! Get the World Cats Cup Pack and go on a trip around the world!

World Cats Cup Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 40 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* UL-CHUBER™ WCC Heavy Chaser™ 9' 10" (300 ) - Length: 9' 10" (3.0 m); Casting Weight: 6 – 8 4/5 Oz (170–250 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 22– 56.2 Lb (10–25.5 kg); Action: Fast
* UL-CHUBER™ WCC La Cazadora™ 10' 2" (310 ) - Length: 10' 2" (3.1 m); Casting Weight: 6 – 9 1/2 Oz (170–270 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 35–70.5 Lb (16–32 kg); Action: Moderate
Reels:
* UL-CHUBER™ WCC Ambusher™ 9500 - Ratio: 5; Recovery: 35.5" (90 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/190 (0.5/190), Braid 30/330 (0.28/330); Max Drag: 52.9 Lb (24.0 kg); Drag: Front
* UL-CHUBER™ WCC Torbellino™ 11000 - Ratio: 4.3; Recovery: 45" (115 cm); Capacity: Mono 73/123 (0.8/123), Braid 44/343 (0.32/343); Max Drag: 70.5 Lb (32 kg); Drag: Front

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m):
* Mono .026" (0.65 mm) - Test: 50.7 Lb (23 kg)
* Fluoro .032" (0.8 mm) - Test: 70.5 Lb (32 kg)
* Mono Leader .022" (0.55) (x60) - Length: 2 yd (2 m); Test: 50.7 Lb (23.3 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .030" (0.8) (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 70.5 Lb (32.0 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .030" (0.8) (x10) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 70.5 Lb (32.0 kg)
* Hooks: #3/0, #4/0, #5/0, #6/0, #7/0, #8/0, #9/0, #10/0 (x10)
* Sinkers: Sinker 5 1/2 Oz.(150 g), Sinker 6 Oz.(175 g), Sinker 7 Oz. (200 g), Sinker 8 Oz. (225 g)
* Simple Bell (x3)
* Baits: Medium Cutbait (x20), Large Minnows (x20), Large Cutbait (x20), Crawfish (x20), Duck Mussel Meat (x20), Aracu Minnow (x20), Dead Lambari Fish (x30), Chicken Liver (x20), Huge Cutbait (x20), Leeches (x50), Mole Cricket Larva (x50), Giant Silk Moth Larva (x20)

EQUIPMENT
* Garry Scott™ WCC Сatfish Сonqueror Jacket - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2
* RIVERTEX™ WCC Cat Valise Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 4; Lines: 2
* Garry Scott™ Fish Citadel L - Max Single Fish Weight: 165 Lb (75 kg); Total Fish Weight: 551 Lb (250 kg)

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Michigan License
Advanced Louisiana License
Advanced Germany License
Advanced Bolivia License
Advanced Brazil License

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz

  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
